District Two
============

Isabel Lozano

Term Expires May 2027

* Email

  [ccouncil2@wacotx.gov](mailto:ccouncil2@wacotx.gov "Compose an email to ccouncil2@wacotx.gov")
Isabel Lozano was elected in May 2025 to serve as the City Councilwoman for District 2. A proud resident of South Waco and a lifelong community advocate, she is also an elementary school principal.

Before her election, Isabel served on the Waco Transit Advisory Board, the Plan Commission, and the Board of Caritas of Waco. Currently, she is a board member of the Hispanic Leaders’ Network and the Region 12 TEPSA (Texas Elementary Principals and Supervisors Association), where she actively champions leadership and educational equity across the region.

Her main priorities include improving public infrastructure, supporting youth and families, and expanding economic opportunities for residents. Isabel is married to her high school sweetheart, and together they have three married adult children and five grandchildren, who bring them immense joy.

[Find your council district](https://www.waco-texas.com/My-Area)
